value: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

. The islands are located in the
, depending your definition, northeast of the
There is very little that travels to the South Sandwich Islands. There may be one or two cruise ship or yacht visits in a year. In winter the pack ice extends to surround the islands.
The islands are completely uninhabited by humans, though are home to millions of penguins.
It's an extraordinary place to go penguin spotting.
There is no economic activity on the South Sandwich Islands.
There are no accommodations in the South Sandwich Islands.
